nav.div: Derby Public Schools » Parents » Enrollment » 2020-2021 Kindergarten Pre-Enrollment

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;

span.br: Do you have a child that will be five years old on or before August 31, 2020? If so, we encourage you to watch a recording of

p.span: Kindergarten Pre-Enrollment meetings held via Zoom to gather more information about what is to come for your child this fall.
Pre-Enrollment is occurring virtually due to Coronavirus (COVID-19). Our school buildings may be closed, but learning and planning for the future continues!

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; min-height: 11px; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
p.span: Recordings of Zoom meetings held for each school are available HERE.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; min-height: 11px; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
p.span: Pre-enrollment information will be collected via a Google form instead of picking up/returning packets to each school. To complete the online Google form, or if you would like to view the Items typically included in a printed pre-enrollment packet, click HERE.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; min-height: 11px; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;

span.strong: Items Needed to Complete Online Pre-Enrollment Form

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
p.span: 1. A certified copy of the birth certificate for each child enrolling. (Scan/Take a photo to e-mail building secretary, names HERE)

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
p.span: 2. Proof of residence in the Derby school district. This would be a current copy of a water/gas/electrical bill.
p.em: (Scan/Take a photo to e-mail building secretary, names HERE)

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
p.em: Needed by first day of school and is available on website)

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
p.span: 4. A health assessment (physical) for each child starting school in Kansas if he/she is under nine years old.
p.em: Needed by first day of school and is available on website)

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; min-height: 11px; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: 0px;
p.span: Note: Derby Public Schools will have new home attendance boundaries implemented for the 2020-2021 school year. An Address Locator Tool is available at www.derbyschools.com and can be used to help determine each student’s assigned attendance center. Click “Address Locator / E-Link” at the top of the district website.
